particleengine

Class ParticleData

  • java.lang.Object
    • particleengine.ParticleData

  • public class ParticleData
extends java.lang.Object
    Pre-generation data for a single particle.

        public ParticleData sinusoidalXMotion(float amplitude,
                             float frequency,
                             float phase)
        Parameters:
        amplitude - Amplitude of sinusoidal motion along emitter's x-axis, in world units.
        frequency - Frequency of sinusoidal motion along emitter's x-axis, in hertz.
        phase - Phase of sinusoidal motion along emitter's x-axis, in degrees.

      • fadeTime

        public ParticleData fadeTime(float fadeIn,
                    float fadeOut)
        Parameters:
        fadeIn - Fade in time. An alpha value multiplier linearly ramps up from particle's start of life.
        fadeOut - Fade out time. An alpha value multiplier linearly ramps down to particle's end of life.
        Returns:
        this
